name: Age of Wonders: Planetfall
notes:
"Saving settings failed" message shown when game starts if used on OS with active non-latin locale: 
https://forum.paradoxplaza.com/forum/index.php?threads/aow-planetfall-saving-settings-failed.1230093/
Bug was reproduced in 1.002.36388 build

### Workaround:
cd $your_game_wineprefix/drive_c/users/$your_username/
ls -l
# Locate the folder with gibberish name like 'РњРѕРё РґРѕРєСѓРјРµРЅС‚С‹'
# Copy that name

# Create symlinks in proper localized 'My Documents' directory
# (be sure to replace fake variable names with actual values)
# For example:
gibberish_name='РњРѕРё РґРѕРєСѓРјРµРЅС‚С‹'
localized_my_documents='Мои документы'
find "$gibberish_name"/Paradox\ Interactive/Age\ of\ Wonders\ Planetfall/ -mindepth 1 -type d  -exec ln -s $(readlink -f {}) "$localized_my_documents"/Paradox\ Interactive/Age\ of\ Wonders\ Planetfall/ \;

files.goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG installer for this game

content:
files:
- goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG installer for this game
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Age of Wonders Planetfall/AowPF.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Age of Wonders Planetfall
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    executable: goginstaller
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: false
